data.meta_description: Tony Blair.docx - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Tony Blair was born in 1953 in Scotland and served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1997 to 2007, making him the youngest Prime Minister in over 180 years. As Prime Minister, Blair oversaw military interventions in Kosovo, Sierra Leone, Afghanistan and Iraq. He also helped advance the Northern Ireland peace process. Blair formed strong alliances with US Presidents Bill Clinton and George W. Bush on foreign policy matters. He raised some taxes but also introduced policies aimed at market reforms and reduced some welfare benefits.
